parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Sides

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Resistance [[Side|side]]. <br>
When used in a [[format]] statement (<tt>hint [[format]]["%1",resistance]</tt>), the string returned is <tt>"GUER"</tt>.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''resistance'''

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Side]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> SQS:<code>?((side _unit) == [[resistance]]) : [[hint]] "This is a resistance unit!"</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> SQF:<code>[[if]] (([[side]] _unit) == [[resistance]]) [[then]] {
    [[hint]] "This is a resistance unit!";
};</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[side]], [[west]], [[east]], [[civilian]], [[sideEmpty]], [[sideAmbientLife]]
</value></part></template>
